"},{"text":"Standard Liquids","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Standard liquids can be stored by liquid tanks.

Water Tank
- Drains water buckets, water bottles
- Fills buckets, bottles
- Fills adjacent cauldrons"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.standard_liquids.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Lava Tank
- Drains lava buckets
- Fills buckets
- Fuels adjacent furnaces
- Drains lava cauldrons
- Fills adjacent cauldrons

Rabbit Stew Tank
- Drains rabbit stew
- Fills bowls
- Feeds players"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.standard_liquids.2"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Beetroot Soup Tank
- Drains beetroot soup, beetroot
- Fills bowls
- Feeds players

Mushroom Stew Tank
- Drains mushroom stew
- Fills bowls
- Milks mooshrooms
- Feeds players"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.standard_liquids.3"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Milk Tank
- Drains milk buckets
- Fills buckets
- Milks cows
- Clear mob effects

Honey Tanks
- Drains honey bottles, honey blocks
- Fills bottles
- Casts honey blocks into cauldrons
- Clears mob poison
- Feeds players"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.standard_liquids.4"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Experience Tanks
- Drains bottles o' enchanting, enchanted books
- Fills bottles
- Absorbs experience orbs, player experience points
- Fills player experience points"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.standard_liquids.5"}]}]
